description: Two figures adrift in a small, inflatable raft on the ocean express relief at being found, seemingly unaware that the massive ship towering over them is about to run them down. The scene highlights the dark irony of their situation, where being located by a potential rescuer instead leads to immediate peril. The enormous scale of the ship compared to their tiny craft underscores the absurdity of their hopeful reaction. Their contentment in the face of impending destruction creates a surreal and unsettling contrast. This novel situation portrays a search-and-rescue scenario gone horribly wrong due to a catastrophic misjudgment of the outcome.
caption: "Thank goodness, Malcolm! We've finally been spotted!"
